# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

{
    'name': 'Website Mass Mailing Campaigns',
    'description': """
Add a snippet in the website builder to subscribe a mass_mailing list
    """,
    'version': '1.0',
    'category': 'Marketing',

        'views/website_mass_mailing_templates.xml',
